description: The Nautilus Cocktail is a tasty recipe that will make any day great. This drink has a fantastic taste, and it's easy to prepare. If you are looking for the perfect way to end your evening, this cocktail is the answer!
name: Nautilus

recipeInstructions.name: Chill a cocktail glass. Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until cold.
recipeInstructions.text: Chill a cocktail glass. Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into the chilled glass, garnish and serve.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into the chilled glass, garnish and serve.
